name: logitech tap
description:
Product Features:
• Comfortable 14° angle 10.1" touch display
• Anti-glare and oleophobic coating
• 3.5mm headphone jack
• Motion sensor
• Bring instant content sharing via wireless or HDMI connections to video meetings rooms
• Optional accessories: Table Mount, Riser Mount, Wall Mount, PC Mount, Logitech Swytch, Cat5e Kit, Logitech Strong USB

Product Specifications:
• External Dimension: 58 x 244 x 179mm 
• Weight: 1.25kg
• Touch Screen: 10.1" diagonal screen with 14° display angle, Oleophobic and anti-glare coating 1280 x 800 resolution
• Internal cable retention and strain relief system
• Integrated ultrasonic speaker
• Integrated PIR Motion Sensor
• 100mm x 100mm VESA FDMI (Flat Display Mounting Interface)
• Kensington Lock slots (2)

System Requirements:
• Windows® 10
• Chrome OS™ 80 and higher
• Logi CollabOS
• USB 2.0, 3.0, or 3.1 Type A port

Package Contents:
i) Tap Touch Controller Cat5e Kit:
• Logitech Tap Receiver
• Dongle Transceiver
• 100-240v Power Supply with International Adaptor Set
• 2.97 m Cat5e Cable
• 7.0 m Cat5e Cable
• HDMI 1.4a cable 2.0 m
• VESA Mounting Screws (4)
• Microfiber Cloth
• Documentation

ii) Tap Touch Controller Logitech Strong USB 2.0 / 3.0 / 3.1 / 3.2 Cable 10 m
• Type A (male) to Type C (male)
• Aramid-reinforced
• Plenum Rated
• Eca / IEC 60332-1-2 Compliant
• 20 mm Conduit friendly
• HDMI 1.4a cable 2.0 m
• Power adaptor with regional plugs (100-240v) 2.95 m
• VESA Mounting Screws (4)
• Microfiber Cloth
• Documentation
